item.title: An Inventor Is Injecting Bleach Into Cancerous Tumors—and Wants to Bring the Treatment to the US
item.description: A Chinese man with no medical training is injecting cancer patients with a toxic bleach solution; a full course of treatment runs $20,000. He’s now working to bring the unproven treatment to the US.

item.title: An Inventor Is Injecting Bleach Into Cancerous Tumors—and Wants to Bring the Treatment to the US
item.description: A Chinese man with no medical training is injecting cancer patients with a toxic bleach solution; a full course of treatment runs $20,000. He’s now working to bring the unproven treatment to the US.

item.title: Colbert Teases Trump After Name Reportedly Listed in Epstein Files: “Mystery Man Known Only as Micropenis DJT”
item.description: A new report from the Wall Street Journal alleges that Attorney General Pam Bondi told Trump his name was mentioned in Jeffrey Epstein’s sex-trafficking investigation files.

item.title: Colbert Teases Trump After Name Reportedly Listed in Epstein Files: “Mystery Man Known Only as Micropenis DJT”
item.description: A new report from the Wall Street Journal alleges that Attorney General Pam Bondi told Trump his name was mentioned in Jeffrey Epstein’s sex-trafficking investigation files.
